definition: reach high to the sky/tall/of great height
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: He could not rank as yet with the magnates of the eastthe serried sequoias of wall street .
sentences.chinese: 他还不能够同东部大王们华尔街林立的参天红杉并列。

sentences.english: Lofty tree most dread the thunder.
" Ningxiang garden" near the cemetery He Yingrui Cooper verdant forest, towering.
sentences.chinese: “凝香园”附近的何应瑞墓地古柏成林，苍郁参天。

sentences.english: There is origin even for vast ocean, and root for giant trees.
sentences.chinese: 浩瀚大海有源头，参天大树有须根。

sentences.english: The saplings have grown into large trees.
sentences.chinese: 早已长成了参天的材树。

sentences.english: The mountain and after the lake are featured by clear and elegant water, towering pines, and quietness.
sentences.chinese: 后山后湖碧水潆回，古松参天，环境清幽。

sentences.english: But those are huge old trees.
Man's anger, blows woman's pit of the stomach, can devastate the towering big tree.
sentences.chinese: 男人的怒气，吹进女人的心坎，会摧残参天大树。

sentences.english: The terrace encloses the greened patio in whose centre a tree grows through the open roof.
sentences.chinese: 露台将绿色的中庭围住，一棵大树参天而立。

sentences.english: The red house stands out against the old trees that reach high up to the sky.
sentences.chinese: 这座红房子在参天古树的映衬下十分夺目。

sentences.english: Garden flowers are blooming, and ancient trees.
sentences.chinese: 园内山花烂漫，古木参天。

sentences.english: Around the house are full of ancient big trees with birds and cicadas chirping.
sentences.chinese: 屋前房后到处是古木参天，蝉鸣鸟叫。

sentences.english: Unprofitable eloquence is like the cypress, which is GREat and tall, but bears no fruit.
sentences.chinese: 无益雄辩不济事，犹如柏树参天不结果。

sentences.english: In the time of Qianlong, the vegetation in Chengde was extremely good, and pines reached high up to the sky, blotting out the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 乾隆时期承德植被极好，参天蔽日的树环绕避暑山庄。

sentences.english: All wood lush gardens, towering old pines.
sentences.chinese: 全园林木葱郁，古松参天。

sentences.english: When lofty trees I see barren of leaves.
sentences.chinese: 当我看见参天的树枝叶尽脱。

definition: verdant/lush green and full of life
tall and erect, reaching through the clouds (idiom); used to describe tall mountain or skyscraper
evergreen pine and cypress (idiom); steadfast nobility
to wrap one's arm around (used to describe the girth of a tree trunk)
pine and cypress/fig. chaste and undefiled/fig. tomb
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
